giftcash.title: GiftCash
giftcash.desc: Giftcash, a motivation kick-starter for your investment
giftcash.text.welcome: Welcome Gift for new customer only. Refer friend gift is for everyone
giftcash.text.refer.friend: Refer friend and when they completed VSD account registration both will get reward
giftcash.text.only.complete: Only completed VSD count to be rewarded
giftcash.text.to.get.giftcash: To get a GiftCash, you need to upgrade to VSD account (verified by Stock Exchange) level first
giftcash.text.welcome.gift: *Welcome gift only for new customers who haven’t had trading account at Pinetree
giftcash.text.giftcash.pinetree: Giftcash is Pinetree’s motivation gift for you to invest to stock only. Let’s make some order and enjoy
giftcash.text.balance: GiftCash balance arrive after 1 business day
giftcash.text.once.fulfill: Once you fulfill all condition, your reward will arrive your balance the next buniness day. Stay tune and you can earn more by inviting friends
giftcash.text.invest: Invest with GiftCash is special experience
giftcash.text.list.eligible: There are a list a eligible stock codes for you to invest. They are hand-picked limited. GiftCash allows you to buy stock in ATO, MP, ATC order types only to ensure the liquidity
